name: Learn Together
description: Collaborative study platform enabling users to share knowledge, engage in discussions, and enhance learning together.
technologyStack: React.js, Tailwind CSS, React Router, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB,
challenges: Implement tanstack query in all the data fetching functionality (For GET method only)
Implement JWT on login (Email/Password and social) and store the token. Make sure to store the token in local storage. Donâ€™t use cookies
Implement pagination (at least on 2 different pages)
Admin Dashboard: If the admin rejects a study session, a modal popup will appear. This popup will contain these input fields: Rejection reason, Feedback
Tutor Dashboard: The tutor views the rejection reason and feedback
improvements: Change the UI design and add more sections.

name: HelpUp
description: Platform connecting volunteers with causes and organizations globally.
challenges: On the Need Volunteer Page, if the number of volunteers needed is 0, then it will show a message, and the user cannot add it through 'Be a Volunteer'.
Implement a dark/light theme toggling in the Navbar for the whole web application.
Upon login, create a JWT token and store it on the client side. Send the token with the call and verify the user. Implementing 401 and 403 is optional.
Ensure the JWT token is implemented on private routes for both email/password authentication and social login.
In the Need Volunteer Page, initially, there will be a three-column layout. On clicking the change layout button, the layout will change to a table form layout.
improvements: Improve mobile responsiveness and add more categories for volunteer opportunities.

name: Chill Gamer
description: Game review platform allowing users to rate and discuss their favorite titles.
challenges: Handling user authentication and implementing a scalable database structure.
Implementing a dark/light theme toggle in the Navbar for the whole web application.
Using Lottie React, React Simple Typewriter, React Awesome Reveal, and React Tooltip for dynamic and interactive UI components.
Adding sorting functionality on the 'All Reviews' page based on rating and year, with ascending and descending options.
Adding a filter functionality on the 'All Reviews' page to filter reviews based on the Genres field of the game.
Implementing a dark/light theme toggle for the home page.
Exploring and implementing at least 2 of the following packages: Lottie React, React Simple Typewriter, React Awesome Reveal, React Tooltip.
At the top of the 'All Reviews' page, adding a dropdown button for sorting reviews by 'Rating' and 'Year'.
At the top of the 'All Reviews' page, adding a dropdown menu for filtering reviews based on the Genres field of the game.
improvements: Add game recommendation  and improve the UI/UX design.

name: Discount Pro
description: Optimized e-commerce platform for gadgets and tech products.
challenges: Handling user authentication and implementing a scalable database structure.
Implementing a dark/light theme toggle in the Navbar for the whole web application.
Using Lottie React, React Simple Typewriter, React Awesome Reveal, and React Tooltip for dynamic and interactive UI components.
Adding sorting functionality on the 'All Reviews' page based on rating and year, with ascending and descending options.
Adding a filter functionality on the 'All Reviews' page to filter reviews based on the Genres field of the game.
Implementing a dark/light theme toggle for the home page.
Exploring and implementing at least 2 of the following packages: Lottie React, React Simple Typewriter, React Awesome Reveal, React Tooltip.
At the top of the 'All Reviews' page, adding a dropdown button for sorting reviews by 'Rating' and 'Year'.
At the top of the 'All Reviews' page, adding a dropdown menu for filtering reviews based on the Genres field of the game.
Implementing the forgot password feature with a functional form to reset the password via email and redirect the user to Gmail to log out.
Adding an update information feature in the 'my-profile' route with a form to update the user's photo URL and name.
Implementing a special animation using an NPM package (AOS, Animate.css, or similar) on the homepage.
Implementing password toggling on the registration page, allowing users to show or hide the password using an 'Eye' icon.

name: Fitness
description: A modern fitness website designed to inspire and guide users on their health journey.
challenges: Designing a visually appealing and easy-to-use interface.
improvements: Integrate user profile management and progress tracking.

name: GadgetHaven
description: An e-commerce platform for gadgets with advanced search and cart features.
challenges: Ensuring product names and prices are displayed on product cards when added.
Displaying the total number of items added to the cart.
Displaying the total price of items in the cart (wishlist).
Resetting the cart to 0 after a successful payment.
improvements: Add multi-vendor support and improve product recommendation engine.
